thread.section_title: Think Protection Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Think Protection | thinkprotection.com
thread.title: Bernice Pasternac
thread.title_full: Think Protection reviewed by Bernice Pasternac

author: Bernice Pasternac
title: Bernice Pasternac
text:
We're very happy with the Think Protection system. It was so easy to set up and use. We love having the fobs allowing us to arm or disarm the alarm with the push of a button. Also great to be able to do the same using our smartphones from anywhere ( as we discovered on our recent trip to Mexico)!
Really happy that it's a wireless system. We highly recommend Think Protection!
